page.title: 15Farming in Woodford
page.content: {Hilltop Farm}_keeps dairy cattle on its 70 acres. {Longfield Farm}_is a poultry farm and has about 15 acres. {Lostock HAll}_has not been farmed for appoximately 20 years. {Meadow Farm}_has 10 acres and stocks hens,cows geese and bales hay. {Moorend Farm}_is adjacent to our school and is just grassland. {Oaklea Poultry Farm}_situated on Jenny Lane.It has 10 acres of grassland as well as keeping the hens.Sheep and horses graze on the grassland. {Old Hall Farm}_built in 1660 and stocks dairy cattle. {Swineseye Farm}_has about 70 acres and keeps cows,pigs,sheep and chicken.The area is mainly covered by grassland. {Walnut Tree Farm}_is situated on the boundary of Woodford and Poynton.It is all grassland and has no animals.
